mapper.insert: insert into sys_user ( username, password, name, phone, avatar, description, status, ) values ( #{userName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{avatar}, #{description}, #{status} )
mapper.update:
update sys_user set
username = #{userName},
password = #{password},
name = #{name},
phone = #{phone},
description = #{description},
status = #{status},
update_time = now() where id = #{id}
update sys_user set is_deleted = 1, update_time = now() where id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select from sys_user where username = #{userName} and is_deleted = 0

select from sys_user
order by id desc
select distinct m.* from sys_menu m inner join sys_role_menu srm on m.id = srm.menu_id inner join sys_user_role sur on srm.role_id = sur.role_id where sur.user_id = {#userId} and is_deleted = 0
